title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Discontinue Sales of Senior Interagency Passes  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Discontinue Sales of Senior Interagency Passes  As of July 1, 2016, Weir Farm National Historic Site has discontinue the sale of the Senior Interagency Pass. Weir Farm National Historic Site will continue to issue free Access, Annual Military, and Annual Every Kid in a Park Interagency Passes.
